name: weather-monitoring-system
description: Full-stack Weather Monitoring and Automation System

scripts.start:full: concurrently "npm run backend" "npm run celery-worker" "npm run celery-beat" "npm run frontend" --names "API,WORKER,BEAT,UI" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,magenta,green" --kill-others-on-fail
scripts.redis: docker start redis-weather || docker run -d --name redis-weather -p 6379:6379 redis
scripts.stop: echo Use Ctrl+C to stop all services
